Interface CustomerRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Customer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Customer,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface CustomerRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>
    Repository for customer

      • findPurchasedCouponsByPriceLessThan

                                                                                                                                                                      double price)
